name: Datadog Core Demo Pack
author: Datadog SE Team
description: Essential talk tracks for core Datadog demos covering dashboards, APM, logs, infrastructure, and more.

tracks.title: Dashboard Overview
tracks.content:
## Dashboard Overview

Datadog dashboards provide real-time visibility into your entire stack.

### Key Points

- **Unified View**: See metrics, traces, and logs in one place
- **Customizable**: Drag and drop widgets to create the perfect view
- **Shareable**: Share dashboards with your team or embed them externally

### Demo Flow

1. Show the template variable selectors at the top
2. Highlight the different widget types (timeseries, heatmap, top list)
3. Demonstrate drill-down by clicking on a data point
4. Show the time range selector and live mode

tracks.title: APM Service Map
tracks.content:
## APM Service Map

The Service Map provides a visual representation of your entire microservices architecture.

### Key Points

- **Automatic Discovery**: Services are automatically detected from traces
- **Health at a Glance**: Color-coded by error rate and latency
- **Dependencies**: See upstream and downstream dependencies

### Demo Flow

1. Point out the different service types (web, database, cache)
2. Show how hovering reveals key metrics
3. Click on a service to see detailed metrics
4. Demonstrate filtering by environment or team
5. Show the request flow through the architecture

tracks.title: Log Explorer
tracks.content:
## Log Explorer

Datadog Log Management provides powerful search and analysis capabilities.

### Key Points

- **Centralized Logging**: All logs in one place, regardless of source
- **Powerful Search**: Full-text search with faceted filtering
- **Live Tail**: Real-time log streaming for debugging
- **Patterns**: Automatic pattern detection to reduce noise

### Demo Flow

1. Show the facet panel on the left for filtering
2. Demonstrate a search query with multiple conditions
3. Show log patterns to identify common issues
4. Click into a log to show the full context
5. Demonstrate pivoting to related traces or metrics

tracks.title: Infrastructure Host Map
tracks.content:
## Infrastructure Host Map

Visualize your entire infrastructure at a glance with the Host Map.

### Key Points

- **Real-time View**: See all hosts updated in real-time
- **Grouping**: Group by any tag (availability zone, team, environment)
- **Color Coding**: Highlight issues by coloring hosts by any metric
- **Multi-cloud**: Works across AWS, Azure, GCP, and on-prem

### Demo Flow

1. Show grouping by availability zone or data center
2. Color by CPU or memory utilization
3. Hover over a host to see key metrics
4. Click to drill down to host details
5. Demonstrate filtering by tag

tracks.title: Monitors Overview
tracks.content:
## Monitors Overview

Datadog Monitors provide proactive alerting across your entire stack.

### Key Points

- **Multi-Signal**: Alert on metrics, logs, traces, synthetics, and more
- **Intelligent Alerting**: Anomaly detection, forecasting, outlier detection
- **Flexible Notifications**: Route alerts to the right team via Slack, PagerDuty, etc.
- **Composite Monitors**: Combine multiple conditions for sophisticated alerting

### Demo Flow

1. Show the different monitor types available
2. Walk through creating a simple metric monitor
3. Demonstrate the alert conditions and thresholds
4. Show notification channels and message templates
5. Highlight the monitor status page and history

tracks.title: RUM Application Overview
tracks.content:
## Real User Monitoring (RUM)

Understand how real users experience your application.

### Key Points

- **Core Web Vitals**: Track LCP, FID, CLS automatically
- **User Sessions**: Replay user sessions to see exactly what happened
- **Error Tracking**: Capture JavaScript errors with full context
- **Performance**: Identify slow pages and resources

### Demo Flow

1. Show the application performance overview
2. Highlight Core Web Vitals scores
3. Demonstrate session replay for a user journey
4. Show error tracking with stack traces
5. Identify performance bottlenecks by page or resource

tracks.title: Synthetic Monitoring
tracks.content:
## Synthetic Monitoring

Proactively monitor your applications before users are impacted.

### Key Points

- **API Tests**: Monitor endpoint availability and response times
- **Browser Tests**: Simulate user journeys through your application
- **Global Coverage**: Test from 100+ locations worldwide
- **CI/CD Integration**: Run tests as part of your deployment pipeline

### Demo Flow

1. Show an existing browser test recording
2. Demonstrate the test results and screenshots
3. Highlight the global locations and scheduling
4. Show how tests integrate with CI/CD
5. Demonstrate the alerting on test failures

tracks.title: Security Signals
tracks.content:
## Security Monitoring

Detect threats and security issues across your infrastructure and applications.

### Key Points

- **Threat Detection**: Out-of-the-box rules for common attack patterns
- **Cloud Security**: Monitor misconfigurations across cloud providers
- **Application Security**: Identify vulnerabilities in your code and dependencies
- **Compliance**: Track compliance posture against frameworks

### Demo Flow

1. Show the security signals overview
2. Drill into a specific security signal
3. Demonstrate the investigation workflow
4. Show cloud security posture management
5. Highlight compliance reporting capabilities
